text: I have noticed... that men usually leave married women alone and are inclined to treat all wives with respect. This is no great credit to married women.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Girls shouldn't worry about being the equal of men in the business world.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Marriage destroyed my relationship with two wonderful men.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: I've found men are less likely to let petty things annoy them.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: I think one of the basic reasons men make good friends is that they can make up their minds quickly.
author: Marilyn Monroe
